result.eng: I'd like a pint of beer please.
result.ga: Ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoil
result.orig: Ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoil
result.html: Ba mhaith liom pionta beorach le do thoilI'd like a pint of beer please.
result.ponchtml: Ba ṁaiṫ liom pionta beoraċ le do ṫoilI'd like a pint of beer please.

result.eng: Pint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ga: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.orig: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fear
result.html: Pionta Guinness le do thoil - Seo duit - Maith an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}
result.ponchtml: Pionta Guinness le do ṫoil - Seo duit - Maiṫ an fearPint of Guinness please. - There you are. - Good man. {thank you}

result.html: Pionta pórtair le do thoilA pint of porter, please.
result.ponchtml: Pionta pórtair le do ṫoilA pint of porter, please.

result.html: Ba bhreá liom pionta anoisI'd love a pint now.
result.ponchtml: Ba ḃreá liom pionta anoisI'd love a pint now.
